Many vunerable adults are being mistreated, abused and ignored!

Let's make sure that your parents, grand parents, siblings and relatives are treated with the dignity and respect that they deserve!

How many times have you seen carers get a bad reputation in the news?
More needs to be done to protect vunerable adults in care! Too many bad carers have their jobs because the companies need staff, this should not be the case! Care workers are supposed to look after people, not abuse them!

Imagine if you were unable to look after yourself. You would have to trust the care workers that come into your home to look after you. This is becoming impossible.

There are 7 types of abuse:
1.Neglect
2.Physical Abuse
3.Financial Abuse
4.Sexual Abuse
5.Psychological Abuse
6.Discriminating Abuse
7.Institutional Abuse

People should not have to get abused before action is taken to protect them. More should be done to make sure they are never abused!
